# Business Plugins

# Setup

## Python

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import semantic_kernel as sk
from semantic_kernel.connectors.ai.open_ai import AzureChatCompletion, OpenAIChatCompletion
from IPython.display import display, Markdown
```
:::


## Kernel

::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
kernel = sk.Kernel()

api_key, org_id = sk.openai_settings_from_dot_env()

kernel.add_text_completion_service(
    "openai", OpenAIChatCompletion("gpt-3.5-turbo", api_key, org_id))

print("A kernel is now ready.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
A kernel is now ready.
```
:::
:::


# Business Plugins

## Business goals

1. Grow the existing business
2. Save money and time
3. Add completely new business
4. Prepare for the unknown

## Plugins directory

```directory
plugins-sk/
│
└─── BusinessThinking/
     |
     └─── BasicStrategies/
     |    └─── config.json
     |    └─── skprompt.txt
     |
     └─── SeekCostEfficiency/
     |    └─── config.json
     |    └─── skprompt.txt
     |
     └─── SeekTimeEfficiency/
          └─── config.json
          └─── skprompt.txt
```

## Activate plugins

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginsDirectory = "../plugins-sk"

pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


# Cost Efficiency 

## Input strengths and weaknesses

::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
strengths = ["Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards", "Owner trained in Sicily at some of the best pizzerias",
             "Strong local reputation", "Prime location on university campus"]

weaknesses = ["High staff turnover", "Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair",
              "Absence of popular calzones from menu", "Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients"]
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
```
:::


## Run kernel with cost efficiency plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["SeekCostEfficiency"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_str = str(
    "### ✨ Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies\n" + str(costefficiency_result))
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(costefficiency_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
### ✨ Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies
| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Streamlining operations | Strong local reputation | High staff turnover | Implementing efficient processes and systems to reduce the need for excessive staff and improve productivity. This can include automating certain tasks, cross-training employees, and implementing performance management systems. |
| Renovating seating areas | Prime location on university campus | Floods damaging seating areas | Investing in repairs and renovations to the seating areas to attract more customers and improve the overall dining experience. This can include fixing any damages caused by floods, updating the furniture and decor, and creating a more inviting atmosphere. |
| Adding popular calzones to the menu | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Expanding the menu to include popular calzones can attract a wider customer base and increase sales. This can involve researching and developing delicious calzone recipes, training staff on how to prepare them, and marketing them to customers. |
:::
:::


# Business Strategy

## Input opportunities and threats

::: {.cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
opportunities = ["Untapped catering potential", "Growing local tech startup community",
                 "Unexplored online presence and order capabilities", "Upcoming annual food fair"]

threats = ["Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby", "There's nearby street construction that will impact foot traffic",
           "Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas", "No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season"]
```
:::


## Import plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
my_context['opportunities'] = ", ".join(opportunities)
my_context['threats'] = ", ".join(threats)
```
:::


## Run kernel 

::: {.cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["BasicStrategies"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_str = "## ✨ Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis\n" + \
    str(bizstrat_result)
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=14}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(bizstrat_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
## ✨ Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis
### Building on strengths can immediately improve the business

| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Expand menu with popular calzones | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Add popular calzones to the menu to attract customers who are looking for a different type of pizza option |
| Improve seating areas | Strong local reputation, Prime location on university campus | Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair | Repair and upgrade the seating areas to provide a comfortable and inviting environment for customers |
| Enhance online presence and marketing | Strong local reputation | Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients | Develop a strong online presence through social media, website, and online advertising to target the younger demographic and showcase the unique aspects of the business |

### Taking advantage of opportunities whenever possible

| Title | Opportunity | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Launch catering services | Untapped catering potential | Tap into the untapped market of catering services by offering customized pizza options for events, parties, and corporate gatherings |
| Develop online ordering capabilities | Unexplored online presence and order capabilities | Create a user-friendly online ordering system to cater to the growing trend of online food ordering and delivery services |
| Participate in the upcoming annual food fair | Upcoming annual food fair | Showcase the unique garlic pizza recipe and attract new customers by participating in the local food fair, offering special discounts and promotions |

### Building resilience to threats is always a good idea

| Title | Threat | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Enhance cost-saving measures | Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas | Implement cost-saving measures such as optimizing ingredient usage, negotiating better deals with suppliers, and finding alternative sources for ingredients to mitigate the impact of rising cheese costs |
| Diversify customer base | Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby | Expand marketing efforts to target different customer segments, such as families, students, and professionals, to reduce reliance on a single customer base and mitigate the impact of competition |
| Stay updated on local regulatory changes | No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season | Stay informed about potential regulatory changes that may affect the business, especially during election seasons, and adapt strategies accordingly to minimize any negative impact |
:::
:::
